summary: A prototype application built to explore possible workflow for integrating Evernote with Factiva.
description: This proof-of-concept application shows how a Factiva user might save articles or selections to their Evernote account. Upon creating a new note, the user would then have access to a list of related notes from within their organization thus allowing them to research topics more efficiently and surface relevant content that might have otherwise been missed.
features: Built on the Express.js framework for Node
RESTful API that hooks into Evernote's API

summary: A custom reporter for the Javascript testing framework, mocha.
description: Developers understand that testing code is a must and command-line reports are great. But how do you share test results with non-developers? Mochawesome was built as a way to visualize test results in a way that anyone can understand. Delve deeper and Mochawesome reveals test code snippets, error stacks, and even timing performance.
features: At-a-glance view gives a quick summary of test results
Error stacks show exactly where code failed

summary: An interactive dashboard that gives a high-level overview of your Jira Agile Sprint.
description: Edwin was built as a modern replacement for the physical whiteboards used in Agile development. It allows teams to easily see the overall progress of their current Sprint and Jira integration ensures the board is always up-to-date.
features: Get a clear understanding of Sprint progress
Issues link directly back to Jira

summary: An application for creating professional, attractive newsletters from industry-leading content.
description: Factiva Newsletter Builder allows users to search the breadth of Factiva content or use their own sources to easily build and deploy newsletters. The intuitive drag-and-drop interface makes structuring the newsletter as simple as moving articles into place. When ready, the user can choose from elegant pre-defined templates or easily create their own and then deploy in multiple formats.
features: Optimized views for each step of newsletter creation
